data.meta_description: Pages is the most beautiful word processor youâve ever seen on a mobile device. Start with an Apple-designed template to instantly create gorgeous reports, digiâ¦
data.text:
Pages is the most beautiful word processor youâve ever seen on a mobile device. Start with an Apple-designed template to instantly create gorgeous reports, digital books, resumes, posters, and more. Or use a blank document and create your own design. Easily add images, movies, audio, tables, charts, and shapes. You can even draw and annotate using Apple Pencil on supported devices, or use your finger. Pages has been designed exclusively for iPad and iPhone.

Draw and annotate using Apple Pencil or your finger

â¢ Easily add drawings with pen, pencil, crayon, and fill tools, then animate them and watch them come to life

â¢ Use Smart Annotation to add comments and marks that stay anchored to their associated text

â¢Â Convert your handwritten words to typed text with Scribble and Apple Pencil

Collaborate with others at the same time

â¢ With real-time collaboration, your whole team can work together on a document at the same time on Mac, iPad, iPhone, and even on a PC

â¢ Share your document publicly or with specific people, see whoâs currently in the document with you, and view other peopleâs cursors to follow their edits

â¢ See a list of recent changes in collaborative documents, including when people join, comment, and make edits

â¢ Available for documents stored in iCloud or in Box

Get started quickly

â¢ Choose from over 90 Apple-designed templates to instantly create beautiful reports, digital books, resumes, cards, posters, and more

â¢ Use Screen View on iPhone to automatically display text, images, and other elements in a continuous flow optimized to fit your screen so documents are even easier to read and edit

â¢ Get quick access to shapes, media, tables, charts, and sharing options

â¢ Import and edit Microsoft Word and text files

â¢ Quickly open password-protected documents using Touch ID or Face ID on supported devices

Create beautiful documents

â¢ Format your document with gorgeous styles, fonts, and textures

â¢ Enhance your document with a library of over 700 editable shapes

â¢ Easily add images, video, and audio

â¢ Add an image gallery to view a collection of photos on the same page

â¢ Create interactive EPUB books that can be shared with others or published to Apple Books for download or purchase

Advanced tools

â¢ Use the table of contents view to easily navigate your document or book

â¢ Add comments and join threaded conversations

â¢ Turn on change tracking to mark up a document as you edit it

â¢ Add bookmarks to easily link from one part of your document to another

â¢ View pages side by side as you work

â¢ Turn on facing pages to format your document as two-page spreads

â¢ Create page templates to keep the design consistent across your page layout document

â¢ Add linked text boxes so text easily flows from one place to another

â¢ Create footnotes and endnotes and view character, word, and paragraph counts

â¢ Add elegant mathematical equations using LaTeX or MathML notation

â¢ Use presenter mode to easily read and auto scroll text while giving a speech

iCloud

â¢ Turn on iCloud so your documents are automatically available on your Mac, iPad, iPhone, and from a Mac or PC browser at iCloud.com

â¢ Pages automatically saves your documents as you make changes

Share a copy of your work

â¢ Use AirDrop to send your document to anyone nearby

â¢ Quickly and easily share a link to your work via Mail or Messages

â¢ Export your document in EPUB, Microsoft Word, RTF, TXT, and PDF format

â¢ Print wirelessly with AirPrint, including page range selection, number of copies, and two-sided printing

Some features may require Internet access; additional fees and terms may apply.

#wordscapefunð¤© ,

Good start

I have been using Pages for a long time now, and I think that it is overall a fantastic app. However, there are some glitches that are not helpful and using the app extraordinarily difficult to start. The auto correction is too extreme whenever I would type simple words such as because or table, it would put a red line under it, saying that I spelled it wrong. I would check all of the words that I got wrong using a dictionary, and I still got the same result. I had to fix this by turning off the auto correction completely, which wasnât what I wanted to do because itâs some cases I do want the auto correct, but not in cases where it is that extreme. Secondly, the templates are super Jenkee. I cannot get a single one of them to work like they are supposed to. I canât find a way to change the background on any of the templates, so I just had to start with a blank book. not to mention the pages have a weird gibberish title, Erna sempter and itâs not helpful because what I need is just a blank line with spacing and a chapter 1 where I have to delete so much that I donât have any room to actually write a novel. starting with a blank document is the only thing that works well and even that Jenkee. If you could, please change these this would be a very good app and it would be just like word. I would appreciate it if these changes were made thank you very much.
